overview: Three lighthearted tales of a woman (Clancey McCauley) who just can't stay out of trouble! "You Get What You Pay For" finds a rich girl held for ransom by an inept kidnapper. "The Girl from W.A.V.E." finds a young woman dreaming of being an exotic spy and being taken captive by a foreign agent. And in "The Date from Hell" a couple's fantasy kidnapping turns all too real when the girl is actually kidnapped!
title: Damsel in Distress
